name: KAMASUTRA \ 爱经
description: Kamasutra is a puzzle game for studying poses in sex. The game has 10 puzzles, each of which opens after the passage of the previous one. The picture is divided into several parts and you need to collect it.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS Processor: pentium g4560 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: geforce gt 730 Storage: 200 MB available space
